overview: Neil Lawrence is sent to a boarding school by his father.  During the first days he meets T.J. who he falls in love with.  After being assigned a paper on Holden Caulfield - the main character in J.D. Salinger's "The Catcher in the Rye" - Neil decides to go on a journey to meet Salinger, who he feels has played a huge role in his life.  Neil & T.J. take off on a journey to New York City.  A journey that leads to more then they both ever could have imagined - and changes both their lives forever.
title: Chasing Holden
